docs.title: automaxoviewer
docs.text: A JavaFX GUI application to streamline the curation of Medical Action Ontology (MAxO) annotations by organizing the output of automaxo.

docs.title: setup
docs.text:
We will generate a standalone executable with GraalVM once the app is mature. For now, checkout the project and enter the following to run it

mvn clean package
mvn javafx:run

To run the app from IntelliJ, add the following to the VM options (Edit Configurations of run button) 

--add-exports=javafx.base/com.sun.javafx.event=org.controlsfx.controls
--add-modules
javafx.base,javafx.graphics
--add-reads
javafx.base=ALL-UNNAMED
